question: find the surface area of a 10 cm * 4 cm * 3 cm brick .
how much is it cost $ 0.50 each tire for 8 tires ?
| x + 3 | – | 2 - x | = | 8 + x | how many solutions will this equation have ?
if two integers x , y ( x > y ) are selected from - 10 to 1 ( inclusive ) , how many possible cases are there ?
if 15 students in a class average 70 % on an exam and 10 students average 95 % on the same exam , what is the average in percent for all 25 students ?
mahesh marks an article 15 % above the cost price of rs . 540 . what must be his discount percentage if he sells it at rs . 460 ?

if a farmer wants to plough a farm field on time , he must plough 160 hectares a day . for technical reasons he ploughed only 85 hectares a day , hence he had to plough 2 more days than he planned and he still has 40 hectares left . what is the area of the farm field and how many days the farmer planned to work initially ?
at an elementary school , 60 % of the faculty members are women and 60 % of the faculty members are married . if 3 / 4 of the men are single , what fraction of the women are married ?
some students are standing in a circle in which 6 th and the 16 th student are standing opposite to each other . find how many students were present there .

a store owner estimates that the average price of type a products will increase by 15 % next year and that the price of type b products will increase by 10 % next year . this year , the total amount paid for type a products was $ 4500 and the total price paid for type b products was $ 8300 . according to the store owner ' s estimate , and assuming the number of products purchased next year remains the same as that of this year , how much will be spent for both products next year ?
a , b and c invested rs . 6600 , rs . 4400 and rs . 11000 respectively , in a partnership business . find the share of a in profit of rs . 12100 after a year ?

a car started running at a speed of 38 km / hr and the speed of the car was increased by 2 km / hr at the end of every hour . find the total distance covered by the car in the first 10 hours of the journey .
a train 150 m long is running with a speed of 98 kmph . in what time will it pass a man who is running at 8 kmph in the same direction in which the train is going
if | 20 x - 10 | = 150 , then find the product of the values of x ?

a person spends 40 % of his salary on food , 25 % on house rent , 15 % on entertainment and 5 % on conveyance . if his savings at the end of the month is rs . 1500 , then his salary per month in rupees is :
renu can do a piece of work in 8 days , but with the help of her friend suma , she can do it in 3 days . in what time suma can do it alone ?
if all the 6 are replaced by 9 , then the algebraic sum of all the numbers from 1 to 100 ( both inclusive ) varies by how much ?

bucket p has thrice the capacity as bucket q . it takes 60 turns for bucket p to fill the empty drum . how many turns it will take for both the buckets p & q , having each turn together to fill the empty drum ?

working at a constant rate , p can finish a job in 4 hours . q , also working at a constant rate , can finish the same job in 15 hours . if they work together for 3 hours , how many more minutes will it take p to finish the job , working alone at his constant rate ?
36 men can complete a piece of work in 18 days . in how many days will 81 men complete the same work ?
a sum fetched total simple interest of 4016.25 at the rate of 13 p . c . p . a . in 5 years . what is the sum ?
if 40 % of a number is equal to two - third of another number , what is the ratio of first number to the second number ?
if n is a positive integer and the product of all integers from 1 to n , inclusive , is a multiple of 650 , what is the least possible value of n ?
amithab ' s average expenditure for the january to june is rs . 4200 and he spends rs . 1200 in january and rs . 1500 in july . the average expenditure for the months of febraury to july is
what is the least number of squares tiles required to pave the floor of a room 2 m 42 cm long and 1 m 76 cm broad ?

on a partly cloudy day , milton decides to walk back from work . when it is sunny , he walks at a speed of s miles / hr ( s is an integer ) and when it gets cloudy , he increases his speed to ( s + 1 ) miles / hr . if his average speed for the entire distance is 2.8 miles / hr , what fraction of the total distance did he cover while the sun was shining on him ?
if 3 a – 2 b – 4 c = 32 and √ 3 a - √ ( 2 b + 2 c ) = 4 , what is the value of a + b + c ?
if 40 % of a certain number is 160 , then what is 50 % of that number ?
200 is what percent of 50 ?

a particular library has 75 books in a special collection , all of which were in the library at the beginning of the month . these book are occasionally loaned out through an inter - library program . if , by the end of the month , 65 percent of books that were loaned out are returned and there are 61 books in the special collection at that time , how many books of the special collection were loaned out during that month ?
a trader sells 85 meters of cloth for rs . 8925 at the profit of rs . 5 per metre of cloth . what is the cost price of one metre of cloth ?
what least number must besubtracted from 427398 so that remaining no . is divisible by 15 ?
carina has 130 ounces of coffee divided into 5 - and 10 - ounce packages . if she has 2 more 5 - ounce packages than 10 - ounce packages , how many 10 - ounce packages does she have ?
if the number 992 , 132,24 x is divisible by 11 , what must be the value of x ?
a car gets 40 kilometers per gallon of gasoline . how many gallons of gasoline would the car need to travel 150 kilometers ?
an employer pays rs . 30 for each day a worker works , and forfeits rs . 5 for each day he is idle . at the end of 60 days , a worker gets rs . 500 . for how many days did the worker remain idle ?
a person can swim in still water at 16 km / h . if the speed of water 8 km / h , how many hours will the man take to swim back against the current for 12 km ?
if the number 872 , 152,24 x is divisible by 11 , what must be the value of x ?
2 : 5 = 4 / 3 : x . the value of x is ?
if 50 honey bees make 50 grams of honey in 50 days , then 1 honey bee will make 1 gram of honey in how many days ?
if each side of a square is increased by 25 % , find the percentage change in its area ?
the h . c . f . of two numbers is 25 and the other two factors of their l . c . m . are 14 and 16 . the larger of the two numbers is

heinz produces tomato puree by boiling tomato juice . the tomato puree has only 20 % water while the tomato juice has 90 % water . how many liters of tomato puree will be obtained from 40 litres of tomato juice ?
on dividing a number by 56 , we get 29 as remainder . on dividing the same number by 8 , what will be the remainder ?
what is the cp of rs 100 stock at 8 discount , with 1 / 5 % brokerage ?
if the sides of a triangle are 26 cm , 24 cm and 12 cm , what is its area ?
the speed of a boat in still water is 18 kmph . what is the speed of the stream if the boat can cover 48 km downstream or 32 km upstream in the same time ?
how many positive integers less than 24 are prime numbers , odd multiples of 5 , or the sum of a positive multiple of 2 and a positive multiple of 4 ?
a train 180 m in length crosses a telegraph post in 20 seconds . the speed of the train is ?

line m lies in the xy - plane . the y - intercept of line m is - 5 , and line m passes through the midpoint of the line segment whose endpoints are ( 2 , 4 ) and ( 6 , - 8 ) . what is the slope of line m ?
